SELECT bm.MessageID, bm.Subject, DATE_FORMAT(bm.CreateDate, '%Y.%c.%d') CreateDate ,(CASE IsTop WHEN 'N' THEN 'Z' ELSE (CASE WHEN #{localCurrentDate} BETWEEN TopStartDate AND TopEndDate THEN 'A' ELSE 'Z' END) END) AS ListTop
,(SELECT MAX(FileID) FROM sys_file WHERE ObjectType ='FD' AND ObjectID = BM.FolderID AND MessageID = BM.MessageID AND SaveType='IMAGE') AS FileID
,IFNULL((SELECT Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang},bcn.DisplayName) FROM board_category bc JOIN board_category bcn ON bc.CategoryPath= bcn.CategoryPath WHERE BM.CategoryID = BC.CategoryID AND BC.FolderID = BM.FolderID),'') AS CategoryName
FROM covi_smart4j.board_message BM WHERE BM.FolderID =#{folderID}
AND ( BM.Subject LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%') || BM.BodyText LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%') )
AND BM.DeleteDate IS NULL AND BM.MsgState IN ('C', 'A') AND BM.MsgType != 'S' AND UseSecurity != 'Y' AND (ExpiredDate IS NULL OR ExpiredDate >= #{localCurrentDate} ) AND (ReservationDate IS NULL OR ReservationDate < #{localCurrentDate}) AND BM.IsCurrent = 'Y' ORDER BY ListTop ASC, Seq DESC, step ASC
LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{pageOffset}

SELECT A.MessageID, A.FolderID, A.Seq, Step, Depth, IFNULL(A.Subject, '') AS Subject, IFNULL(BodyText, '') AS BodyText, IFNULL(B.Body, '') AS Body, DATE_FORMAT(CreateDate, '%Y.%c.%d') CreateDate
,(SELECT MAX(FileID) FROM sys_file WHERE ObjectType ='FD' AND ObjectID = a.FolderID AND MessageID = a.MessageID AND SaveType='IMAGE') AS FileID
FROM board_message AS A LEFT JOIN sys_contents AS B ON A.MessageID = B.MessageID AND A.FolderID = B.ObjectID AND A.Version = B.Version WHERE A.FolderID =#{folderID} AND A.MessageID = #{messageID} AND A.Version = '1' LIMIT 1

SELECT f.ServiceType , f.FilePath , f.SavedName , f.CompanyCode ,S.LastSeq as "StorageLastSeq" ,S.FilePath as "StorageFilePath" ,S.InlinePath ,S.IsActive FROM sys_file f INNER JOIN sys_storage S ON S.StorageID = f.StorageID WHERE f.ObjectType ='FD' AND f.ObjectID = #{folderID} AND f.MessageID = #{messageID} AND f.SaveType='IMAGE' LIMIT 1
